thread.title: ACC law change will help superannuitants after spouse’s death (New Zealand Government)
thread.title_full: ACC law change will help superannuitants after spouse’s death (New Zealand Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: ACC law change will help superannuitants after spouse’s death (New Zealand Government)
text: ( Source : New Zealand Government ) ACC Minister Nikki Kaye has confirmed that Cabinet has signed off a law change that will help some superannuitants better cope with the accidental death of their spouse or partner. 'Under the current law,
